name: Best Res. ASHP (RST)
_description: Best Available residential air source heat pump, non-cold-climate, replace resistance

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: High efficiency ASHP performance in 2023; COP = SEER / 3.412, COP = HSPF / 3.412 (see EIA source); split system conversion factors SEER2/SEER = 0.95, HSPF2/HSPF = 0.85 (see RESNET source)

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Draft PDS-01, MINHERS Addendum 71, SEER2/HSPF2 Conversions
Residential Demand Module of the National Energy Modeling System: Model Documentation 2014

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost for 'High' ASHPs in 2023

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average 'High' equipment lifetime in 2023, rounded down from 15.3

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

central AC.title: RECS 2020 Microdata
central AC.fraction_derivation: Central AC multiple of 32% was determined as the proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling (main air conditioning equipment type = central AC = 1) in the sample is 12,211 homes, and then filtered for homes with electric heating system (Main space heating fuel = electricity = 5) 3,949 homes.

market_scaling_fractions_source.resistance heat: Applies to all homes with electric resistance furnaces (the resistance heat tech. is indicative of a forced air electric furnace in the EIA data)
